review.title: Giving the AI definition a form suitable for the engineer
review.abstract: This article tackles a number of technical issues related to the AI definition. These include the format of the data, the Undef and Nothing symbols, different ways of defining the meaning of life, as well as the introduction of the concept of "incorrect move". These are issues of no material importance, if we are interested in the AI definition from a purely theoretical point of view; however, if we want to develop a real program satisfying that definition, we are to find these issues important.

sections.text: ar Xiv: 131 2.57 13v1 [cs.AThis article deals with a number of technical issues related to the definition of AI. These include the format of the data, the Undef- and Nothing-symbols, different ways of defining the meaning of life, and the introduction of the concept of "false movement." These questions are not essential if we are interested in the definition of AI from a purely theoretical point of view; however, if we want to develop a real program that meets this definition, we will find these questions important.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.text: That is the question we must ask ourselves in order to understand why it has come to this.

sections.heading: Format of the data
sections.text: In fact, it is the case that one is able to put oneself at the top without being able to do what one is supposed to do in order to do it.

sections.heading: Signals
sections.text: Definition: The function of an argument (of time) returned by a scalr is called a signal. This means that the coordinates of the vectors are signals. Let's take four types of signals: input, output, reward and internet. The output signals are the coordinates of the output vector. The input and reward signals are the coordinates of the input vector. Note: We explicitly separated the input into two parts: reward signal, which gives us the meaning, and a pure information part. The same thing was done in [1]. In [1] the reward was expressed in two signals, which we called "victory" and "loss." The same thing was done in [3], but there we have another reward signal called "wrong movement." The situation in [2] is completely different - we have only one input signal, which both the information and the reward part of the input form the end vector, we have seen off the input part, the input part, and the input part of the signal, we have seen.

sections.heading: Non-Boolean vectors
sections.text: In fact, most of us are able to play by the rules we have set ourselves in order to fulfil them.

sections.heading: Possible evaluations
sections.text: This year, it is closer than ever before in the history of the country.

sections.text: In fact, most of us are in a position to put ourselves in another world, in which they put ourselves in another world, in which they get lost in another world, in which they get lost in another world, in which they get lost in another world, in which they get lost in another world, in which they get lost in another world, in which they get lost in another world, in which they get lost in which they live in another world, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they live, in which they, in which they live, in which they, in which they live, in which they, in which they, in which they, in which they live.
